recipe.name: Steak in a Bag
recipe.preparation: Prepare egg breadcrumbs, set aside.  Remove excess fat from steak.  In small bowl, mix margarine, oil, seasoned salt + pepper until well blended.  Spread on all sides of the steak.Mix breadcrumbs + cheese.  Press into butter mixture on steak.  Put steak in brown paper bag.  Fold end over + secure with staples or paper clips.  Steak may now be refrigerates for several hours.Before cooking, bring steak to room temperature.  Preheat oven to 375F.  Place bag in rimmed baking sheet + bake 30 minutes.  For medium-rare steak, increase oven temp to 425F + bake 15 min more, total of 45 min.  Remove steak from bag.  Let stand 5 minutes before carving into thin slices.Two steaks may be baked in same bag.  Double the recipe but keep baking time the same.
